title: How Quora Died. “The once-beloved forum is now home to a never-ending...
content:
How Quora Died. ‚ÄúThe once-beloved forum is now home to a never-ending avalanche of meaningless, repetitive sludge, filled with bizarre, nonsensical, straight-up hateful, and A.I.-generated entries along with a slurry of all-caps non-questions‚Ä¶‚Äù (via waxy.org)
